languages.text: {n}Оскалившись, мутант визжит:{/n} "Да возляжет на тебя благодать Пращура!" {n}Его слова впиваются в ваш слух, превращаются в пронзительное эхо сотни... голосов? Разумов? Оно звучит все громче, терзая ваш разум, и рука сама ложится на оружие.{/n}

{n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оскалившись, мутант визжит:{/n} "Да возляжет на тебя благодать Пращура!" {n}Его слова впиваются в ваш слух, превращаются в пронзительное эхо сотни... голосов? Разумов? Оно звучит все громче, терзая ваш разум, и рука сама ложится на оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Forebear rest upon you!" {n}His words pierce your hearing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it you reach for your weapon.{/n}

{n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Forebear rest upon you!" {n}His words pierce your hearing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it you reach for your weapon.{/n}

{n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

{n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

{n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mutante grita, sonriente.{/n} «¡Que la gracia de nuestro Progenitor esté contigo!» {n}Sus palabras son penetrantes y retumban con la fuerza de cien... ¿voces? ¿Mentes? La cacofonía se intensifica, atormentando tu mente, y casi sin darte cuenta llevas la mano a tu arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante grita, sonriente.{/n} «¡Que la gracia de nuestro Progenitor esté contigo!» {n}Sus palabras son penetrantes y retumban con la fuerza de cien... ¿voces? ¿Mentes? La cacofonía se intensifica, atormentando tu mente, y casi sin darte cuenta llevas la mano a tu arma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}变种人咧嘴笑着，发出了尖叫声。{/n}“愿元祖的恩泽赐福于你！”{n}他的声音变得很刺耳，变成了几百个……尖锐声音的回声？或是来自心灵的回声？声音越来越大，摧残着你的心智。你还没反应过来，身体就已经下意识地抄起了武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人咧嘴笑着，发出了尖叫声。{/n}“愿元祖的恩泽赐福于你！”{n}他的声音变得很刺耳，变成了几百个……尖锐声音的回声？或是来自心灵的回声？声音越来越大，摧残着你的心智。你还没反应过来，身体就已经下意识地抄起了武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}変異体は甲高い声を上げて、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「始祖の恵みがあらんことを！」{n}その言葉が突き抜けて、けたたましく反響する…これは、100の声？それとも精神か？それはますます大きくなって心を蝕み、気がつくと武器に手を伸ばしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体は甲高い声を上げて、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「始祖の恵みがあらんことを！」{n}その言葉が突き抜けて、けたたましく反響する…これは、100の声？それとも精神か？それはますます大きくなって心を蝕み、気がつくと武器に手を伸ばしていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant kreischt und grinst dann.{/n} "Möge die Gnade des Progenitors mit Euch sein!" {n}Seine Worte sind durchdringend und werden zu einem schrillen Echo von hundert ... Stimmen? Bewusstseinen? Das Geräusch wird immer lauter, es quält deinen Geist, und bevor du es dich versiehst, greifst du nach deiner Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mutant kreischt und grinst dann.{/n} "Möge die Gnade des Progenitors mit Euch sein!" {n}Seine Worte sind durchdringend und werden zu einem schrillen Echo von hundert ... Stimmen? Bewusstseinen? Das Geräusch wird immer lauter, es quält deinen Geist, und bevor du es dich versiehst, greifst du nach deiner Waffe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le mutant sourit et s'exclame :{/n} « Que notre Géniteur vous offre sa grâce ! » {n}Ses mots perçants se transforment en un écho strident d'une centaine de... voix ? D'esprits ? Il se fait de plus en plus fort, au point de tourmenter votre âme et de vous pousser à tendre inconsciemment la main vers votre arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant sourit et s'exclame :{/n} « Que notre Géniteur vous offre sa grâce ! » {n}Ses mots perçants se transforment en un écho strident d'une centaine de... voix ? D'esprits ? Il se fait de plus en plus fort, au point de tourmenter votre âme et de vous pousser à tendre inconsciemment la main vers votre arme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mutant sırıtarak nara atıyor.{/n} "Ata'mızın lütfu üzerinize olsun!" {n}Bu kuvvetli sözler, yüzlerce sesin, belki de zihinlerin yankısından oluşan bir uğultuya dönüşüyor. Uğultu artıkça artıyor, zihnine işkence ediyor. Farkında olmadan elin, silahına davranıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant shrieks, grinning,{/n} "May the grace of our Progenitor be upon you!" {n}His words are piercing, becoming a shrill echo of a hundred... voices? Minds? Growing ever louder, it torments your mind, and before you know it, you reach for your weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant sırıtarak nara atıyor.{/n} "Ata'mızın lütfu üzerinize olsun!" {n}Bu kuvvetli sözler, yüzlerce sesin, belki de zihinlerin yankısından oluşan bir uğultuya dönüşüyor. Uğultu artıkça artıyor, zihnine işkence ediyor. Farkında olmadan elin, silahına davranıyor.{/n}
